comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

> Collaborators do not receive a notification when you delete an issue. - https://docs.github.com/en/issues/tracking-your-work-with-issues/deleting-an-issue

I will always report the same tracker to multiple repositories. And recently, I discovered that you deleted my issue (about adguard.com tracker) without explanation, so I'm here to get an explanation.

comment.body:
I saw it, but it looks like a website design, so I'm not sure if it should be fixed.
Please add this rule:
```
lanacionar-la-nacion-ar-prod.cdn.arcpublishing.com#$#.sidebar__aside { background-image: none !important; }
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
It seems that cookie notice is blocked by `I don't care about cookies`, so please add this rule:
```
@@/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=capital.fr
```
to user rules.

@kiboke Could you please take a look?
Video player doesn't work if cookie notice is blocked.

comment.body:
Could you please describe what exactly is a problem here?

Website works fine on my end. With `AdGuard Annoyances filter` enabled, after a while, I'm automatically redirected to the destination page.
With `AdGuard Annoyances filter` disabled I have to wait and click few times on "continue" button and then I'm redirected to the same page.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: otvet.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
@d0x360 It seems that it may be caused by `Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List`, so please disable it or add this rule:
```
@@||nydailynews.com^$generichide,badfilter
```
to user rules and then check again.

comment.body:
Disabling anti tracking worked but the overlay was still there but the user rule

@@||[nydailynews.com](http://nydailynews.com/)^$generichide,badfilter

Did the trick, thank you.

To help me better understand when something like this happens how do I tell what filter list is or may be the issue?

Then once I know do I still report that to you or should I notify Fanboys?

comment.body:
This video player is loading after a while, so I guess that it may still occurs.
This rule:
```
||d3mmnnn9s2dcmq.cloudfront.net^$domain=nydailynews.com
```
should block it (clearing cache may be required), but I'm not sure if it will not block some useful video players on this website.

>To help me better understand when something like this happens how do I tell what filter list is or may be the issue?

For example, you can check filtering log and search for `$generichide` (it should be highlighted in green and if you click on it then there should be information from which filter lists it comes from), this exception disables generic cosmetic rules and may cause that some ad placeholders will be not blocked.
It's usually used to fix anti-adblock issues.

>Then once I know do I still report that to you or should I notify Fanboys?

If you know, that issue is caused by third-party filter then I think that it would be better to report it to maintainers of this filter list.

instead of reporting it.

just in case there is a list of filter issues found that get sent out to
the maintainer once a day or something.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.redflagdeals.com/flyers/shoppers-drug-mart/6-days-of-savings-nov-14-to-nov-19-2020-171111/#](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.redflagdeals.com%2Fflyers%2Fshoppers-drug-mart%2F6-days-of-savings-nov-14-to-nov-19-2020-171111%2F%23) ### Comment Username: @ILikePlayingGames > When AdGuard blocks the banner ad on this page and the other flyer pages like it, the space for the banner ad remains. Is it possible to block this space so there is more room to view the actual flyer? ### Screenshots

issue.title: otvet.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
@zloyden 

This script is also used in `720pizle.io` Maybe there are on more websites.
Don't limit it to domain names. Use generic as before so like below

```
||ceviz.pw/pop.php
||filese.me/pop.php
```

Also, close low quality PRs like #119358 without merge them. Obviously, PR owner doesn't know how to check for dead sites.
These PRs do nothing but increase the workload of the developers.

Other than that, don't remove existing rules. The site may have ads again later. Rules can be deleted only if the website is permanently down.
